cards.flavor_text: [i]Flat-topped sky islands were highly valued by Rabbitfolk and humans alike, as they provided the most arable land, the easiest land to construct cities on, and the land with the best vantage points.[/i]
[i]Leoro Hill acted as both power generator and reservoir, capturing the heavy rains of the Great Winding River as it periodically wandered overhead.[/i]

[i]The region unofficially known as Bile Gyre consisted of clouds of toxic gases vented from the core mixed with water vapor and decaying organic matter, interrupted only by the floating ruins of the mighty cities that predated the Cataclysm.[/i]
[i]​The ancient magical cataclysm resulted in erratic gravity differentials that fueled volcanism and regularly erupted new sky islands millennia later.[/i]

[i]The day-night cycle of the plane had not been disrupted, so the great jungles and woodlands survived as they dispersed. Borne upon wild winds, seeds scattered to far lands to mix with other trees, creating wondrous new hybrids.[/i]
